query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_addresses,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN total_volume >= 10000 THEN id END) as whale_count,
  MAX(last_active_at) as latest_activity,
  MIN(first_seen_at) as earliest_seen,
  AVG(total_volume) as avg_volume
FROM addresses;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EZig2ebo1q21z8.root --database 4sa6kfx5mFXsBhiWnpTsNp --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_addresses,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN total_volume >= 10000 THEN id END) as whale_count,
  MAX(last_active_at) as latest_activity,
  MIN(first_seen_at) as earliest_seen,
  AVG(total_volume) as avg_volume
FROM addresses;
